settings.product_points: Two powerful humectants to hydrate your skin

settings.question: Benefits
settings.details:
• Draws moisture to your skin's surface.
  • Minimize epidermis water loss.
  • Plumps your skin, giving it a dewy & youthful look.
  • Exhibits anti-inflammatory properties.
  • Reduces wrinkles and fine lines.

settings.question: Composition
settings.details:
• Hyaluronic acid for the face is a powerful humectant and helps draw moisture to your skin’s surface.
  • By incorporating D-Panthenol with Hyaluronic Acid, Our serum hydrates even the deepest layers of skin and can be used for all skin types.
  • This serum exhibits anti-inflammatory properties and plumps your skin, leaving it with a dewy, youthful appearance.
  • Free from (i) Essential mineral oils (ii) Sulphates (iii) Parabens and (iv) Dyes. All our products are made to be hypoallergenic and are safe on the skin!
  • Hyaluronic acid can help prepare the skin and works well as a base for makeup to go smooth and flawless - Suitable for all skin types.

settings.question: Ingredients
settings.details: Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Caprylic Capric Triglycerides, Hyaluronic Acid, D-Panthenol (B5), Rosehip Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bisabolol, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Geranium, Wild Hibiscus,Vitamin C, Vitamin A, Honey, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

settings.product_det: Get ready for soft, plump and & moisture-rich skin from Refresh’s 2% Hyaluronic acid serum + D-Panthenol!

settings.pe-percent-det: Said their skin felt moisturized after use*

settings.pe-description: In Customer Testing, Boost was shown to increase skin elasticity and reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.

settings.os-dd-description:
Our serums take a minimum of 84 days of religious usage before they can show noticeable
differences. It's a peeling solution, not a magic potion!

New skincare products might cause rashes or infections. Our products are made with skin safe
ingredients to avoid any side effects!

We have different solutions to tackle different issues. Each one does their job and does it well. There is no
one cure for all skincare issues.

settings.hw_to_use_det: Cleanse your skin with Refresh’s gentle foaming cleanser to remove any dirt or impurities
Apply a couple of drops of Niacinamide serum to your cheekbones and forehead using the dropper.
For optimal results, always leave 2-3 minutes between serums to allow deeper penetration and absorption before layering your face

settings.hw_to_use_subtitle: 3 Simple Steps For Your Skin care Ever

settings.rw_details: Replenshies moisture to your skin and hydrates the top surface
Tighter , smoother skin and regenerates healthy skin

settings.refund_text: 80-Day Full Refund if we’re not the right fit!

settings.faq_question: Should I stop wearing makeup after using the serums?
settings.faq_answers: You don’t have to stop wearing makeup when using the serums. The serums form a good base to clear up your skin and get you ready for your everyday makeup.

settings.faq_question: What serum is best for brightening my complexion?
settings.faq_answers: Our power packed trio of Arbutin, Hyaluronic and Peeling solutions play a major role in skin brightening. The peeling solution helps unclog pores and exfoliate the dead skin cells while the Arbutin and Hyaluronic acid serums can restore the skin’s shine for glowing healthy skin.

settings.faq_question: How often should I use this regimen?
settings.faq_answers: It is recommended that you stick to this regimen everyday during both your AM and PM routines.

settings.faq_question: How much time will it take for the serums to work?
settings.faq_answers: Everyone’s skin reacts differently to different products. We recommend giving your skin some time to acclimate to the serums before seeing noticeable results.

settings.faq_question: Is this product free from harmful chemicals?
settings.faq_answers: Our products do not contain any substances that might harm your skin. All our ingredients are clinically tested and studies show that 99% of the people do not experience any side effects.

settings.product_subtitle: Get rid of dark spots & improve skin glow

settings.featured_in_detail:
PHAs(Polyhydroxy Acids) are the least well-known
of the skincare acids. Due to its large molecules,
they penetrate the skin less thoroughly, & therefore
are less likely to induce side effects.

Hyaluronic acid can help your skin look and feel
more supple. When applied to the surface of the
skin, hyaluronic acid serums can reduce wrinkles,
redness and dermatitis.

Grape seed extract is an active antioxidant &
helps in improved blood circulation. It also
has anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial
properties, and helps from sun damage.

settings.item_dec:
Introducing India’s 1st Foaming cleanser with Purslane
extract. Remove even the hardest to remove makeup, mildly
exfoliate your skin and get the rejuvenation your skin needs
with our foaming cleanser.
settings.what_it_does_title: What does it do to your skin?

settings.item_dec: Say goodbye to clogged pores and hello to smoother and brighter skin. Make exfoliating, pH balancing, pore tightening, and skin moisturizing possible, all with a single toner! 100% Alcohol-free with added PHA to give excellent hydration effects on the skin!
settings.what_it_does_title: What does it do to your skin?

settings.item_dec: Get rid of dark spots and hyperpigmentation forever. Our Arbutin serum with added grape seed extract is more effective and safer alternative to hydroquinone and provides a skin brightening effect.
settings.what_it_does_title: What does it do to your skin?

settings.item_dec: Radiant, glowing skin with 100% Guaranteed results. Being India’s first 20% Vitamin C serum to help brighten your complexion and fight against free radical damage! A glow-boosting serum to reduce sun damage and dark spots.
settings.what_it_does_title: What does it do to your skin?

settings.item_dec: Fast absorbing moisturiser for all skin types to keep skin healthy, hydrated and firm throughout the day. With added cucumber and grape seed extract for added freshness!
settings.what_it_does_title: What does it do to your skin?

settings.item_dec: Introducing the newest range of sunscreen without the cream – Sundrops! Now available in liquid formulation SPF 50 to blend perfectly into your skin without leaving a smudge mark or greasy residue
settings.what_it_does_title: What does it do to your skin?

settings.subtitle_what_expect: Makes the skin – Radiant, Soft, Dewey, Naturally Glowing

settings.Customer_reviews: I absolutely love the Niacinamide acid serum. It keeps my skin hydrated. Not to mention, loved all the other products in the gift kit too.
I have used this serum for a month and I must say it is working pretty well. Though I dont have much wrinkles...
settings.Customer_reviews_more: it has controlled my elasticity. I am happy with the product. Thank you Team refresh skin science.

settings.Customer_reviews: I had a dehydrated skin for a long time, which made my face look dry. One of my friend suggested Hyaluronic serum from Refresh.
settings.Customer_reviews_more: I am using it weekly thrice and now my skin is getting better. It is lightweight and worth the buy!

settings.Customer_reviews: Have been trying out refresh products for a while now and it has become my go -to brand for skincare. Kudos team!

settings.bag_title: Granactive Retinoid Serum For Wrinkles & Fine Lines
settings.bag_sub_title: Reduce signs of aging & improve elasticity
settings.bag_skin_content: I am using granactive serum for 3 months now. Seeing such a huge difference compared to how my skin felt earlier and how it feels now. I definitely would recommend to try this routine!

settings.bag_title: Salicylic Acid Face Serum With Green Tea Extract
settings.bag_sub_title: Reduce active acne for clear skin
settings.bag_skin_content: Used to having continuous acne breakouts every now and then and it really took a hit on my confidence level. After using this serum, i am having less pimple on face and my skin is also healing good.
Been using niacinamide serum for my puberty acne scars which never went off. After 2 months of use and continuous expert consultation with Refresh, my acne scars are finally gone from my face.
